task.summary: Default task
Changed category names to match Google Maps'
Warnings removed, parameters accessed as dictionaries, comments documentable
Converted database /users/{id}/location response to GeoJson
GET /locations/{id} implemented, completing locations endpoint
Code cleanup
Ignore .DS_Store file
API setup for GCP App Engine/Flex deployment
No use case for having a /users/{id}/phone endpoint
No use case for having a /users/{id}/phone endpoint
/authorize and /token face possible deprecation in favor of Passport's /auth
/notifications endpoint implemented & one call combines Google Maps locations (all three categories) and DB custom locations at /locations
Authentication implemented at /auth/login and /auth/logout
Authentication implemented at /auth/login and /auth/logout
Refactor authentication endpoint, added OAuth endpoint stubs.
Refactor authentication endpoint, added OAuth endpoint stubs.
Deleted unused routes
Fixed bug in GET /users where users were being returned twice
Login with username or email now supported by including email in user_table and using internal_authentication for username. /POST users now needs username and email
Updated POST /notification to check if any alertable location has been marked non-alertable
POST /notification finalized
Users endpoints check authorization using session cookie
Completed cascading delete in DELETE /user/{id}
Cleaned up current_state.sql for Cloud deployment
Changed GCP deployment parameters
user_id added to login response
Removed redundant data in category table
Fixed POST /users/{id}/locations. Changed GeoJson key to geometry
/api/v1/users/{id}/password added for GET and PUT
